title: When will today's sale start?
body: Darius is set to go on sale starting today, and I have the RP saved up for him.

replies.body: I don't see Darius listed on our [September sales schedule](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/september-sales-schedule-0). Can you give me a link to something that states he's supposed to go on sale?

Thank you for the response, and... here's the thing...

I looked again to make sure he was supposed to go on sale, but then I saw that he actually wasn't listed. So I'm pretty sure I'm going insane and seeing things.
